description: Recover HP equal to half the damage dealt to the enemy

description: Restores a small amount of HP to an ally

description: Temporarily increases Resistance by 5 (effect decreases by 1 each Turn)

description: Max HP +5 until the chapter/skirmish's end

description: Permanently raises Max HP by 5 and other stats by 2

name: Boots
description: Permanently raises Movement by 2 (cannot be used on the same character twice)

name: Arms Scroll
description: Permanently raises all displayed weapon ranks by 1 level

description: Upgrades a Level 10 or higher unit to a promoted class

name: Second Seal
description: Reclasses a Level 10 or higher (or promoted) unit to a different class

name: Rift Door
description: Summons merchants to the world map

name: Supreme Emblem
description: Reward for achieving max Renown. Sells for 99,999G

name: Dread Scroll

name: Wedding Bouquet
